transcript.text: Claire Dao is standing by just outside
the locker of the man who ended up being
the number one star tonight Kyle bonus
yeah Kyle bonesaw bonus this weekend
now Kyle quite a game for you it's
always tough three and three the fact
that you guys were able to pull this one
out what does it say about this team I
mean it says a lot we showed a ton of
character especially you know starting
starting on the road you know 7:30
late-game with a little bit of travel
and that's the tough tough thing to do
and it's a mental challenge and it's a
physical challenge as well but you know
we were ready for it we had a great week
of practice and you know we were
rewarded for with six points but I mean
that's a really good hockey team so
we're happy with the result yeah that 2
goal lead in the second but then just
before that second intermission they
scored it to make it a one goal game
what was the mindset in that second
intermission stepping on guys for the
third I mean we knew we were in a good
spot you know we like to be obviously
having a lead going the third period in
this building is huge and you know they
do a really good job of when you know we
got momentum this weekend they seemed
like both teams actually was kind of
back and forth and no one really was
able to hold momentum for a long long
span of time so when we started the
third period well created some offense
and got some chances and then you know
had some gun will go in that was great
you were a busy guy tonight obviously a
goal couple of assists some great puck
movement on that first assist you had
yeah you know that's we work a lot on
our line rushes and you know sometimes I
think you can almost get too complicated
with things but you know middle lane
Drive and wide and you know cloudy you
just came down and he seems like a
really really good offensive mind and we
try to get in the puck in those scoring
areas and he'll put it away you had a
pretty goal as well they're just kind of
firing it right past how good did it
feel it felt really good um you know
obviously it's always nice to contribute
we have such a deep offensive team that
it seems like it can be it can be any
any one of nine or ten forest arrests
and you know tonight it was my turn but
you know I knew with Winnie when he had
the puck up in the wing reel off from
all the second intermission I think I
had my stick ready I thought the red
line cuz I knew he was passing it so it
was good to have that one going alright
well thank you so much Congrats on the
win best of luck in case you will see
you saturday perfect thanks
